description:
While Blackbeard and his men seek to sink Marineford, Jimbei and Luffy`s desperate attempt to flee is thwarted by Akainu`s fiery fists. The situation appears dire until a former enemy lends a sandy hand!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akainu no Shuunen! Luffy o Osou Magma no Kobushi
La ténacité d`Akainu. Luffy attaqué par des poings de magma
The Insatiable Akainu! Lava Fists Pummel Luffy!
Упорство Акаину! Магмовый кулак, настигающий Луффи!
أكاينو الجشع! قبضة الحمم تضرب لوفي!
赤犬の執念! ルフィを襲うマグマの拳[こぶし]
